title: Upwards Black Arrow

adjectives: Being or moving higher in position or greater in some value; being above a former position or level
Situated in or facing or moving toward or coming from the north
Extending or moving toward a higher place
Moving up, directed toward a higher place.
Situated at the top or highest position
verbs: To turn or move toward the north.
nouns: North is a noun, adjective, or adverb indicating direction or geography.
One of the four cardinal directions
The cardinal compass point that is at 0 or 360 degrees
A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description:
An arrow, pointing up.

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's up arrow emoji is a clean, bold symbol rendered in a striking shade of blue, featuring a noticeable 3D effect with subtle highlights that suggest a glossy surface. Its sharp, distinct point and smooth, rounded base are classic Apple design cues, conveying a strong sense of direction, progress, and ascent. This emoji is commonly used on Apple devices to indicate moving upwards, increasing in value, or indicating a positive trend in conversations.
